Summary: Waiting for fireworks display to start saw bright orange ball approx. 5 times size of Venus in sky.
divs: Sighting Detailswaiting for display at hollingdean.watching sky suddenly appeared.sat motionless.slowly moved n.e .swift turn to east and dissapeared from view.
